options.name: Clearmind
options.description: You are proficient in relaxing your mind and recharging and can maintain a Full Rest within half the usual time.  Additionally, when you complete a Full Rest, you cannot gain less than twice your level in Health even if you are Wounded.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Center
options.description: You spend an Action to remove any Poison, Ignited, Diseased, Blinded, Dazed, Stunned or Deafened Conditions affecting you.

options.name: Free Action : Manifest Success
options.description: After rolling an Attack as part of an Action where the number on the die is less than a 6, add an additional 1d4 to your total.

options.name: Never Tired
options.description: You are Immune to becoming Exhausted and effects that make you Sleep.

options.name: Reaction : Mind Over Matter
options.description: When you take Damage as part of an Attack, convert all the damage to Psychic and halve it before applying the Mitigation.
